title: Combine Object Arrays
description: In this lab, we will be working on a JavaScript programming exercise aimed at combining two arrays of objects based on a specified property. The purpose of this exercise is to help you practice using the Array.prototype.reduce() method and object manipulation in JavaScript, which are essential skills for any developer working with JavaScript. By the end of this lab, you should be able to seamlessly combine two arrays of objects based on a property to create a new array.

meta.title: Combine Object Arrays
meta.description: Learn how to combine two arrays of objects based on a specified property using JavaScript's Array.prototype.reduce() method.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, combine, javascript practice online, object, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, merge

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 合并对象数组
i18n.description: 在这个实验中，我们将进行一个JavaScript编程练习，目标是根据指定属性合并两个对象数组。这个练习的目的是帮助你练习使用JavaScript中的Array.prototype.reduce()方法和对象操作，这对于任何使用JavaScript的开发者来说都是必不可少的技能。在这个实验结束时，你应该能够根据一个属性无缝合并两个对象数组以创建一个新数组。

meta.title: 合并对象数组
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript的Array.prototype.reduce()方法根据指定属性合并两个对象数组。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 合并, 在线JavaScript练习, 对象, JavaScript实验, JavaScript教程, 数组, 合并

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，通过输入'node'并按下回车键可以运行JavaScript。
